item.title: Fashion retailers partner to offer personalized AI styling tool ‘Ella’
item.description: Ella provides recommendations to customers across the three retailers on what to purchase or rent to make an outfit come to life.

item.title: X’s encrypted DM feature, XChat, is rolling out more broadly
item.description: Though the feature shipped in beta in May, XChat is now accessible for more users, including those who do not subscribe to X Premium.

item.title: OpenAI announces AI-powered hiring platform to take on LinkedIn
item.description: The OpenAI Jobs Platform is set to launch in mid-2026, and will use AI to match candidates with businesses.

item.title: Nepal blocks Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, X over rule breach, amid censorship concerns
item.description: Nepal has moved to block 26 social media platforms for failing to comply with its registration requirements.

item.title: AI logistics startup Augment, from Deliverr’s founder, raises massive $85M Series A
item.description: Having built and sold e-commerce shipping startup Deliverr to Shopify for $2.1 billion in 2022, co-founder and CEO Harish Abbott knows the logistics i...
